description: OPINION AND ORDER as to James Velissaris. On November 21, 2022, seven days before his trial was set to commence, the defendant James Velissaris pled guilty to one count of securities fraud in violation of 15 U.S.C. §§ 78j(b) and 78ff and 17 C.F.R. § 240.10b-5. On March 24, 2023, represented by new counsel, the defendant filed his sentencing submission and simultaneously moved to withdraw his plea of guilty. The motion to withdraw the plea was denied, and the defendant was sentenced on April 7, 2023. This Opinion sets forth the reasons for the denial of the motion to withdraw the plea....[*** See this Opinion And Order ***]... Conclusion. For these reasons and as explained on April 7, the defendant's March 24, 2023 motion to withdraw his plea of guilty has been denied. (Signed by Judge Denise L. Cote on 4/10/2023)(bw) (Entered: 04/10/2023)
